headers.subject: Re: 8.3 RC1 - Logging and filenames
headers.comments: In-reply-to "Joshua D. Drake" <jd@commandprompt.com> message dated "Thu, 10 Jan 2008 16:22:58 -0800"

quote.quotepara: You don't really have any choice about the matter --- Postgres will not use a single fixed filename because that would be guaranteed to lose log entries across a rotation.

body.para: True, if you really dislike the way that the built-in log collector works, syslog is probably your best alternative.
